attributes.action: give a Knighthood to Alan Ball
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Alan should get a knighthood because of his services to the England national team and also clubs. Including Blackpool, Everton, Arsenal and Southampton

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
